00065 #ifndef __MTOUCHCVD_MACROLIBRARY_H
00066 #define __MTOUCHCVD_MACROLIBRARY_H

00071 #undef MTOUCH_SLEEP_STABILIZE_OSC()
00072 #define MTOUCH_SLEEP_STABILIZE_OSC()

00074 // Store current state for:
00075 //  * Working register
00076 //  * STATUS register
00077 //  * PCLATH register
00078 //  * FSR register
00079 
00080 // #define SAVE_STATE()                \
00081 // do {                                \
00082     // asm("movwf  _int_w");           \
00083     // asm("swapf  _int_w, F");        \
00084     // asm("movf   _STATUS, W");       \
00085     // asm("clrf   _STATUS");          \
00086     // asm("movwf  _int_status");      \
00087     // asm("movf   _PCLATH, W");       \
00088     // asm("clrf   _PCLATH");          \
00089     // asm("movwf  _int_pclath");      \
00090     // asm("movf   _FSR, W");          \
00091     // asm("movwf  _int_fsr");         \
00092 // } while (0)
00093 
00094 // Restore current state for:
00095 //  * Working register
00096 //  * STATUS register
00097 //  * PCLATH register
00098 //  * FSR register
00099 
00100 // #define RESTORE_STATE()             \
00101 // do {                                \
00102     // asm("movf   _int_fsr,W");       \
00103     // asm("movwf  _FSR");             \
00104     // asm("movf   _int_pclath,W");    \
00105     // asm("movwf  _PCLATH");          \
00106     // asm("movf   _int_status,W");    \
00107     // asm("movwf  _STATUS");          \
00108     // asm("swapf  _int_w, W");        \
00109 // } while (0)
00110 
00111 #define CVD_RS_SET_GODONE()                                                         \
00112     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)               );  /*                  */  \
00113     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))   ",1");  /* GO_nDONE = 1;    */ 
00114 
00115 
00116     
00117 // Sensor tris set using FSR
00118 // ADCON0 loaded directly
00119 #define CVD_RSC_FSR(current_channel, pin)                                                               \
00120     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)                       );  /*                              */  \
00121     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(current_channel)               );  /*                              */  \
00122     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF)     "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set the sensor to an input   */  \
00123     _NOP_DELAY(CVD_SWITCH_DELAY);                                                                       \
00124     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))               );  /* ADC Mux --> Sensor           */  
00125     
00126 // GUARD SENSOR - IO
00127 #if defined(CVD_GUARD_IO_ENABLED)
00128 
00129     #define CVD_RSCa_FSR_gSET(current_channel, pin)                                                                     \
00130         asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)                                   );  /*                              */  \
00131         asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(current_channel)                           );  /*                              */  \
00132         asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(__paste(_,CVD_GUARD_PORT)) "," ___mkstr(CVD_GUARD_PIN));  /*                              */  \
00133         asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF)          "," ___mkstr(pin)          );  /* Set the sensor to an input   */  \
00134         _NOP_DELAY(CVD_SWITCH_DELAY);                                                                                   \
00135         asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))                           );  /* ADC Mux --> Sensor           */     
00136         
00137     #define CVD_RSCb_FSR_gCLR(current_channel, pin)                                                                     \
00138         asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)                                   );  /*                              */  \
00139         asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(current_channel)                           );  /*                              */  \
00140         asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(__paste(_,CVD_GUARD_PORT)) "," ___mkstr(CVD_GUARD_PIN));  /*                              */  \
00141         asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF)          "," ___mkstr(pin)          );  /* Set the sensor to an input   */  \
00142         _NOP_DELAY(CVD_SWITCH_DELAY);                                                                                   \
00143         asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))                           );  /* ADC Mux --> Sensor           */   
00144            
00145 #endif     
00146 
00147     
00148     
00149 // EXCLUSIVELY MUTUAL SENSING
00150 #define CVD_RSC_FSR_Input_Only(current_channel, pin)    asm("bsf" ___mkstr(_INDF) "," ___mkstr(pin));  /* Set the sensor to an input   */
00151 
00152 
00153 // REFERENCE SOURCE - IO
00154 #define CVD_RSIb_rLAT_CLR(ref_port, ref_pin)                                                                \
00155     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(ref_port)                          );  /*                              */  \
00156     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(ref_port) "," ___mkstr(ref_pin)    );  /* Clear the reference port bit */
00157     
00158 #define CVD_RSIa_rLAT_SET(ref_port, ref_pin)                                                                \
00159     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(ref_port)                          );  /*                              */  \
00160     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(ref_port) "," ___mkstr(ref_pin)    );  /* Set the reference port bit   */
00161     
00162 #define CVD_RS_MUX_REF(ref_channel)                                                 \
00163     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)               );  /*                  */  \
00164     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(ref_channel)           );  /*                  */  \
00165     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))       );  /* ADC Mux --> Ref  */ 
00166 
00167 #define CVD_RS_MUX_SENSOR(current_channel)                                              \
00168     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)               );  /*                      */  \
00169     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(current_channel)       );  /*                      */  \
00170     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))       );  /* ADC Mux --> Sensor   */    
00171    
00172 // GENERIC EXITING OPTIONS
00173 
00174 // Assumes: FSR is Sensor TRIS
00175 //          No Mutual Sensor
00176 //          No DACOUT Guard
00177 #define CVD_RSEa_FSR_CLR_mPORTSET(sensorLat, pin)                                                                \
00178     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(sensorLat)                              );  /*                              */  \
00179     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(sensorLat))  "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set sensor LAT high          */  \
00180     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF)        "," ___mkstr(pin)    );  /* Set the sensor to an output  */
00181     
00182 #define CVD_RSEb_FSR_CLR_mPORTCLR(sensorLat, pin)                                                                \
00183     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(sensorLat)                              );  /*                              */  \
00184     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(sensorLat))  "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set sensor LAT low           */  \
00185     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF)        "," ___mkstr(pin)    );  /* Set the sensor to an output  */
00186     
00187     
00188 
00189  
00190 // Currently Unused
00191 //  FSR = Sensor TRIS
00192 #define CVD_RSP_FSR_sTRIS(port)                                         \
00193     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(port)  );  /*                      */  \
00194     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR)  );  /* FSR = Sensor TRIS    */ 
00195     
00196     
00197 #define CVD_RSIa_VRCON_MAX()                                                                        \
00198     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_VRCON)            );  /*                                      */  \
00199     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(PIC_VRCON_MAX)     );  /*                                      */  \
00200     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_VRCON))    );  /* VRCON = PIC_VRCON_MAX (75% of VDD)   */  
00201     
00202 #define CVD_RSIb_VRCON_MIN()                                                                \
00203     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_VRCON)            );  /*                              */  \
00204     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(PIC_VRCON_MIN)     );  /*                              */  \
00205     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_VRCON))    );  /* VRCON = PIC_VRCON_MAX (VSS)  */   
00206     
00207 #define CVD_RS_MUX_VRCON()                                                                  \
00208     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)                   );  /*                      */  \
00209     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(MTOUCH_AD_DAC_NOGO)        );  /*                      */  \
00210     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))           );  /* ADC Mux --> CVref    */
00211     
00212     
00213 #define CVD_RS_EXIT_FSR_CLR_mPORTSET(port, pin)                                                                                             \
00214     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF)  ","      ___mkstr(pin)     );  /* Set the sensor to an output                                  */  \
00215     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(port)                              );  /*                                                              */  \
00216     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(port)   ","      ___mkstr(pin)     );  /* Set the sensor to output high in preparation for next scan   */
00217 #define CVD_RS_EXIT_FSR_CLR_mPORTCLR(port, pin)                                                                                             \
00218     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF)  ","      ___mkstr(pin)     );  /* Set the sensor to an output                                  */  \
00219     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(port)                              );  /*                                                              */  \
00220     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(port)   ","      ___mkstr(pin)     );  /* Set the sensor to output low now that the scan is complete   */
00221 
00222 
00223 
00224 
00225 #define CVD_RS_POSTA_MATH()                                         CVD_RS_POSTA()
00226 #define CVD_RS_POSTB_MATH()                                         CVD_RS_POSTB()
00227 
00228 // MUTUAL SENSOR
00229 #if defined(CVD_MUTUAL_ENABLED)
00230     #define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_A(index)                                       CVD_MUTUAL_LAT = 0
00231     #define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_B(index)                                       CVD_MUTUAL_LAT = 1
00232 #elif defined(CVD_MUTUAL_EXCLUSIVE_ENABLED)
00233     #define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_A(index)                                       CVD_MUTUAL_LAT = 1
00234     #define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_B(index)                                       CVD_MUTUAL_LAT = 0
00235 #else
00236     #define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_A(index)                               
00237     #define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_B(index)                         
00238 #endif
00239 
00240 
00241 // ACTIVE SCANNING - ENTER, and REFERENCE
00242 #if defined(CVD_MUTUAL_EXCLUSIVE_ENABLED)
00243     #define CVD_RS_INIT_A(indexRef)                         // Left blank
00244     #define CVD_RS_INIT_B(indexRef)                         // Left blank
00245     #define CVD_RS_MUXSELECT(index, indexRef)               CVD_RS_MUX_SENSOR(MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(index))
00246 #else
00247     #if defined(CVD_FORCE_REF_DAC) || (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS == 1)
00248         #if defined(MTOUCH_AD_DAC_NOGO) 
00249             #define CVD_RS_INIT_A(indexRef)                 CVD_RSIa_VRCON_MAX()
00250             #define CVD_RS_INIT_B(indexRef)                 CVD_RSIb_VRCON_MIN()
00251             #define CVD_RS_MUXSELECT(index, indexRef)       CVD_RS_MUX_VRCON()
00252         #else
00253             #if defined(CVD_FORCE_REF_DAC)
00254                 #warning This part does not have a DAC. CVD_FORCE_REF_DAC is being ignored.
00255                 #define CVD_RS_INIT_A(indexRef)             CVD_RSIa_rLAT_SET(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(indexRef), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(indexRef)) 
00256                 #define CVD_RS_INIT_B(indexRef)             CVD_RSIb_rLAT_CLR(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(indexRef), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(indexRef)) 
00257                 #define CVD_RS_MUXSELECT(index, indexRef)   CVD_RS_MUX_REF(MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(indexRef))
00258             #elif (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS == 1)
00259                 #error The mTouch Framework requires a CVref mux option on the ADC in order to scan only one sensor but this part does not have a VRCON.
00260             #endif
00261         #endif
00262     #else
00263         #define CVD_RS_INIT_A(indexRef)                     CVD_RSIa_rLAT_SET(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(indexRef), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(indexRef)) 
00264         #define CVD_RS_INIT_B(indexRef)                     CVD_RSIb_rLAT_CLR(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(indexRef), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(indexRef)) 
00265         #define CVD_RS_MUXSELECT(index, indexRef)           CVD_RS_MUX_REF(MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(indexRef))
00266     #endif
00267 #endif
00268 
00269 // ACTIVE SCANNING - CONNECTION, CONVERSION, and EXIT
00270 #if defined(CVD_MUTUAL_EXCLUSIVE_ENABLED)
00271     #define CVD_RS_PREPARE(index)                       CVD_RSP_FSR_sTRIS(MTOUCH_TRIS_ASM_SENSOR(index))
00272     #define CVD_RS_CONNECT_A(index)                     CVD_RSC_FSR_Input_Only(MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(index), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index))
00273     #define CVD_RS_CONNECT_B(index)                     CVD_RSC_FSR_Input_Only(MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(index), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index))
00274     #define CVD_RS_EXIT_A(index)                        CVD_RSEa_FSR_CLR_mPORTSET(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(index), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index)) 
00275     #define CVD_RS_EXIT_B(index)                        CVD_RSEb_FSR_CLR_mPORTCLR(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(index), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index)) 
00276 #elif defined(CVD_GUARD_IO_ENABLED)   
00277     #define CVD_RS_PREPARE(index)                       CVD_RSP_FSR_sTRIS(MTOUCH_TRIS_ASM_SENSOR(index))
00278     #define CVD_RS_CONNECT_A(index)                     CVD_RSCa_FSR_gSET(MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(index), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index))   
00279     #define CVD_RS_CONNECT_B(index)                     CVD_RSCb_FSR_gCLR(MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(index), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index))   
00280     #define CVD_RS_EXIT_A(index)                        CVD_RSEa_FSR_CLR_mPORTSET(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(index), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index))
00281     #define CVD_RS_EXIT_B(index)                        CVD_RSEb_FSR_CLR_mPORTCLR(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(index), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index))
00282 #else
00283     #define CVD_RS_PREPARE(index)                       CVD_RSP_FSR_sTRIS(MTOUCH_TRIS_ASM_SENSOR(index))
00284     #define CVD_RS_CONNECT_A(index)                     CVD_RSC_FSR(MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(index), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index))
00285     #define CVD_RS_CONNECT_B(index)                     CVD_RSC_FSR(MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(index), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index))
00286     #define CVD_RS_EXIT_A(index)                        CVD_RSEa_FSR_CLR_mPORTSET(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(index), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index))
00287     #define CVD_RS_EXIT_B(index)                        CVD_RSEb_FSR_CLR_mPORTCLR(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(index), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index)) 
00288 #endif
